features: 🎧【Clamp-on Headphone Stand】This headphone holder fits desks from 0.31 inch to 1.57 inch thick, making it a versatile choice for most setups. The spring clamp is a breeze to remove and reattach. It blends seamlessly into your space, whether it's your desk, shelf, or other surface.

🎧【Rotating Adjustable Headphone Arm】Experience effortless access to your headphones with 360-degree swivel design. The gaming headset stand makes it easy to get your desired directions, even tucking them neatly under your desk when not in use.

🎧【Built in Cable Organizer】The headphone hanger features cable clip to hold your headset's cable in place. It's the perfect desk accessory to ensure your gaming setup and office desk remain tidy and organized.

🎧【Curved Edge&Rubber Pads】: Eurpmask's headset holder comes with curved edges and soft rubber pads to safeguard your headset. Plus, rubber pads on the clamp ends prevent damage to your desk or table, whether it's glass,wood,metal,ect.

🎧【Universal Fit】: This headset stand is compatible with almost all wireless and wired headphones,it is the perfect gift for gamers, a must-have gaming desk accessory. It also hang the bag, hat, umbrella and other daily gadgets in your kitchen counter, bookshelf, entrance cabinet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Headset & Controller Holder
reviews.reviewText: Decent product, it gets the job done. Easy assembly, you can decide whether to have 1 or 2 slots for controllers. It adjusts to your desk size and is sturdy. Holds up to two controllers(I have switch controllers) and one headset. Be sure to place it in a low-traffic area on your desk to avoid controllers slipping off the stand. Has a cable clip if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Does exactly what is advertised, the quality is great, and I am able to use it to hold two headphones or headphones, and a controller or two. It’s very helpful for organizing and storage. It’s super lightweight, easy to set up and versatile. It also has a little wire holder for extra support if you need to charge anything that’s not in use. my partner and I game right next to each other so it’s been really nice to store our things on it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Reasonable price, fast delivery, sturdy and you can hang it any place you want. It does the job greatly, can hold up to 3 headphones. Recommends it if you want to organize your desk neatly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a true white, but works
reviews.reviewText: This item works as intended and is really easy to install/set up. The material feels fairly sturdy, and doesn’t feel cheap to me. That being said, I wouldn’t be too rough with it if I were you (wouldn’t want to push my luck). It looks nice and not as bulky as I imagined it would.However, I would like to note that the white color is not a true, bright white. It’s definitely a more neutral or warm white, and likely won’t match your electronic aesthetic if you have white electronics. For example, if you have a white Xbox with white controllers and a matching white Turtle Beach Bluetooth headset, this hook is a very noticeably different shade of white from all of those items. Such is the gamble of buying white gaming accessories. I had a feeling I should’ve gone with black just to err on the side of caution, but I didn’t and now my aesthetic is displeasing.Aside from that, this hook is easy to set up and easy to mount. It has excellent silicone pads for the mount to grip to your surface, as well as silicone pads on the controller mounts to help them stay in place. The item works as intended and I’m pretty happy with its functionality. Overall, I’d recommend this product with the caveat that you stick with a color other than white so that your aesthetic remains pleasing to the eye.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are excellent. Super easy to install and the swivel feature makes them simple to get out of the way. These are exactly what I was looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the PC Gaming Headphone & Controller Holder, and I must say, it has been an absolute game-changer for my gaming setup! This hanger has not only helped me keep my gaming area organized but has also added a touch of convenience to my gaming sessions.First and foremost, the adjustable and rotating arm clamp is a brilliant feature. It allowed me to find the perfect position and angle for my headphones and controllers. Whether I wanted them within easy reach or tucked away when not in use, this holder provided the flexibility I needed.The under-desk design is what truly sets this holder apart. It effectively maximizes my desk space, freeing up room for other peripherals and giving my gaming area a cleaner and more professional look. No more tangled cables or cluttered surfaces!What I particularly love about this holder is its universal compatibility. It effortlessly accommodates all my gaming headsets and controllers, regardless of their brand or model. This versatility is a huge plus, especially for gamers who frequently switch between different devices.The built-in cable clip organizer is a lifesaver. It keeps my cables neatly organized and prevents them from tangling, ensuring a hassle-free gaming experience. I appreciate the thoughtful design that takes cable management seriously.Lastly, the sleek black color of this holder blends seamlessly with my gaming setup. It adds a touch of sophistication and complements the overall aesthetics of my desk.In conclusion, the PC Gaming Headphone & Controller Holder is a must-have accessory for any serious gamer. Its adjustable and rotating arm clamp, under-desk design, universal compatibility, built-in cable clip organizer, and sleek black color make it a perfect solution for organizing and storing your gaming gear. Trust me, this holder will not disappoint, and it will truly elevate your gaming experience!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I attached this to a shelf next to my computer, and it works great for hanging up my headphones. The product is made out of plastic, but it feels sturdy, and you could probably use it to hang up something heavier, like a coat. It also uses a spring for clamping, so you don't need any tools, and you can reposition it easily. I'm pleased with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It can attach to a thicker table than some of its competitors. Very stable and secure. Great deal.

reviews.reviewTitle: Does its job well, but won't do more
reviews.reviewText: This product is plenty strong enough to hold headphones, but I definitely wouldn't try to put a backpack or even a purse on it. (The advertised weight limit is 1kg/2.2lbs.)The clamp seems strong enough for the intended purpose, but not strong enough to prevent all motion.The arm that holds the headphones rotates fairly easily, and locks every 15º, but I don't know if it would have full strength at any angle other than straight out or straight in.You can't mount this arm above the surface you're clamping to; it's designed to hang only.
Buen producto, llegó a tiempo y cumple con lo prometido.
Exactly what I needed, love the fact that it can twist 360°. Also like to hang charging cables on it. Got a good, stable clamp on my desk shelf too.
It’s a great bit of gear, being a clamp it does struggle with my angled desk, but is overall fantastic.

When it rotates out from under the desk, it has the most satisfying clicking, like a ratchet in reverse, but 360 degrees in both directions. Not very strong, the clamp is just springloaded, but it holds my Sundara quite casually.
